mapper.insert:
select member_seq.nextval from dual
insert into member(member_code,userid,nickname,password,username,birth,gender, email1,email2,phone1,phone2,phone3,hp1,hp2,hp3,zipcode,address, address_detail) values(#{memberCode},#{userid},#{nickName},#{password},#{userName},#{birth},#{gender}, #{email1},#{email2},#{phone1},#{phone2},#{phone3},#{hp1},#{hp2},#{hp3},#{zipcode}, #{address},#{addressDetail})
mapper.select: select count(*) from member where userid=#{userid}
select password from member where userid=#{userid} and authcode='1'
select * from member where userid=#{userid} and authcode='1'
mapper.update: update member set nickname=#{nickName}, email1=#{email1},email2=#{email2}, hp1=#{hp1},hp2=#{hp2},hp3=#{hp3},zipcode=#{zipcode}, address=#{address}, address_detail=#{addressDetail} where userid=#{userid} and authcode='1'
